job.title: Solution Architect
job.description:
We are looking for a highly skilled Solution Architect as consultant. 
PFB details :  

Role and Responsibilities 


•Requirements Gathering  	     
•Preparing KT Plan. 
•Team handling. 
•Technical guidance provided in Coding. 
•Coding/Code reviews. 
•Involving in all phases of Software development life cycles. 
•Unit Testing. 
•Deploying project with latest changes. 
•Preparing KT and Technical Specifications documents. 
•Assisted Team with respect to problems ticket. 
•Assisted team in developing payment gateway module, Admin module. 
•Preparing report/mail day-to-day activities to my supervisor.
•Experience in Performance Tuning, Query Optimization, using Performance Monitor, Profiler and other
related monitoring and troubleshooting tools   

    Technical Skills  
Languages  	C#, VB.Net, JQuery, XML, XAML, JavaScript, HTML, CSS  	            
      
Technologies& Frameworks  	ASP.net, .Net Core, WCF, Windows, MVC, Angular  	
RDBMS  	Microsoft SQL Server 2005,2008  	
Tools / IDE  	Visual Studio .NET (2008 – 2012), TFS   	
 Concepts  	Web Services, Design patterns, Web API, Rest API  	
Third party controls  	Ajax

customFields.generatedDescriptionAIv2:
We are looking for a highly skilled Solution Architect who will be responsible for designing and implementing effective solutions for our clients. The ideal candidate will have strong technical expertise and a deep understanding of software architecture principles. Responsibilities include assessing client requirements, designing scalable solutions, collaborating with development teams, and ensuring the successful implementation of projects. The candidate should possess excellent problem-solving abilities and have a proven track record in delivering complex solutions.

Relevant skills:

- Proficiency in software design and architecture
- Strong knowledge of cloud computing platforms
- Experience with database design and optimization
- Excellent communication and leadership skills
- Ability to analyze business needs and provide effective solutions

customFields.finalDescriptionAIv2:
We are looking for a highly skilled Solution Architect who will be responsible for designing and implementing effective solutions for our clients.   
OLES AND RESPONSIBILITIES
Creates/Conducts evaluation of system architecture and collaborates with  project management and IT development teams to improve the architecture
Coordination with infra and lead the process of integrating IT systems `	to meet an organization’s requirements.
Evaluates project constraints to find alternatives, alleviate risks, and perform process re-engineering if required.
Notifies stakeholders about any issues connected to the architecture.
Controlling solution development and fixes technical issues as they arise.
Analyzes the business impact that certain technical choices may have 	on a client’s business processes.
For Pre- sales, understand the client requirement and propose appropriate tech solutions (tech stack,architecture etc)
Capable of instructing professional or technical staff and reviewing the quality of the work undertaken by these roles
Continuously researches emerging technologies and proposes efficient tools,etc for operational Excellence of the org.
Documentation of tech solutions,architecture, process flow etc.
Develop and maintain processes and procedures, aligning with the company culture and policies.
